page.title: 19SCHOOL CHRISTMAS CONCERT
page.content: Most years the school puts on a concert to which parents and friends are invited. Each child in the school takes part in some way or another. Every class has something to do which links in with the main theme. There is always singing, acting and comedy. There are lots of practices the week before the show is performed and all the classes are involved in making costumes and scenery. Many of the parents also help especially with the costumes. We usually have two performances one in the afternoon and the other in the evening. Most children feel nervous and excited before they perform in front of their parents and friends. Quite often special lighting is hired to give better effects. Last year we used a machine which made it look as though it was snowing.
